alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 3:58PM EDT until August 05 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Washington County in southeastern Maine... East central Hancock County in southeastern Maine... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 358 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles northwest of Deblois, or 20 miles northeast of Ellsworth, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Deblois, Mariaville, Eastbrook, Amherst, Aurora, Great Pond and Beddington. This includes State Highway 9 between Amherst and Junction 193. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
